name: KELLY BROTHERS BUILDING CONTRACTORS LLP
goal:
Kelly Group has been trading since 1967. We have a number of trading businesses operating in construction and related industries.

We are a family business that is moving into the second generation at this time.

Kelly Brothers Building Contractors LLP is an 8 person partnership involved in public sector construction contracts (mainly social housing) and private housing developments. This work is primarily in Northern Ireland, with some crossover to Republic of Ireland.

Kellys Point Hire Ltd is a private limited company that hires construction plant and equipment to contractors and domestic customers in Northern Ireland and Republic of Ireland. A significant portion of our hire fleet is equipment that is manufactured in other EU countries.

Kellys Building Supplies (Trading division of Kelko Plant Sales Ltd) is a private company trading as a builders merchants, hardware suppliers and outdoor living / garden suppliers. In addition we have a retail offering at Christmas. Approximately 50% of our purchases in this business is from a buying group based in the Republic of Ireland. In addition, we source the products for our Christmas shop from Italy, Germany, The Netherlands, and Belgium.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Environment, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Youth
euInitiatives: We follow carefully updates on Brexit in the national and local news as we are deeply concerned about the impact of Brexit on our business and loyal employees.
